query:
SELECT 
  hierarchyLevel,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT SUBSTRING(funcao, 1, 50) SEPARATOR ', ') as exemplos_funcoes
FROM employees 
WHERE active = 1 
AND hierarchyLevel IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY hierarchyLevel
ORDER BY 
  CASE hierarchyLevel 
    WHEN 'diretoria' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'gerencia' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'coordenacao' THEN 3 
    WHEN 'supervisao' THEN 4 
    WHEN 'operacional' THEN 5 
  END;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute SELECT 
  hierarchyLevel,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT SUBSTRING(funcao, 1, 50) SEPARATOR ', ') as exemplos_funcoes
FROM employees 
WHERE active = 1 
AND hierarchyLevel IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY hierarchyLevel
ORDER BY 
  CASE hierarchyLevel 
    WHEN 'diretoria' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'gerencia' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'coordenacao' THEN 3 
    WHEN 'supervisao' THEN 4 
    WHEN 'operacional' THEN 5 
  END;
